sub_title: Business Consultant at Raza Corporation Europe
summary:
► Sales, Marketing and Supply Chain Management:
√ 	As a citizen of a populated country, I am very dedicated to work in the area of Sales and Marketing. There is no objection whatever the products.
√	I have very rich experience to identification, selection and development the product and determination the price.
√	I am very good capable to selection of distribution channel to reach the customer place, development and implementation of the Promotional activities.
√	I am Interested to create the Modern Supply Chain Management system to provide the highest degree of customer satisfaction at the lowest cost.
√	I am committed to buildup supply chain partner’s relations, closely work to coordinate order generation, order taking and order fulfillment.    
► International Trading:
√	I am experienced on Export, Import & Indenting procedure and documentation. 
√	I have very good experienced on International Tender Documentation, Price and Service Negotiation, International Standard Business Contract, Bank Guarantee (BG), Standby Letter of Credit (SBLC).
√	I have very good Communication with Local and International Principle, Buyer, Trader, Service and Management Company, Inspection and International Certification Company etc.   
  ► Investment Banking and Finance:
√	I am interested to explore my innovation to Investment Banking, Portfolio Management, Offshore Financing / Offshore Banking, Venture Capital Management, Project and Financial Management services. 
► Professional Networking, Development and Event Management 
√	I am specialized on Professional Networking, Professional Skill Development and Management, Information and Communication Technology based Business and Services.

authors.headline: Business Consultant at Raza Corporation Europe

profile_positions.description:
A.T.M. Golam Rabbani Raza is the Chairman of Raza Corporation and Managing Director as well as CEO of WinBiz Pvt. Ltd. since 2003. He is also the Managing Director of WinTrade Pvt. Ltd., Managing Director of BizFashion and Craft Pvt. Ltd., proprietor of Winstars Technology and WinSoft  and also the country partner of Link Global Express Bangladesh.
He is the Member of the Dhaka Chamber of Commerce & Industry (DCCI), Association of Travel Agents of Bangladesh (ATAB), Association of Cargo Agents of Bangladesh (ACAB), International Air Express Association of Bangladesh (IAEAB) and Bangladesh Computer Samity (BCS). 

Besides Business A.T.M. Golam Rabbani Raza also involved Varieties of Social works.He is the Secretary General of "Sammriddah Bangladesh Jubo Andolon". It is a Non-Government Youth Development Organization working in Bangladesh during 8 (Eight) years.
profile_positions.title: Chairman and CEO

profile_positions.description:
InvestAsia Capital & Asset Management Ltd. has emerged as a new generation Asset Management Company to operate in the capital market of Bangladesh as per Securities and Exchange Commission’s License issued under the Securities and Exchanges Commission (Mutual Fund) Rules-2001.
People Driven
+
Process Driven
InvestAsia has appeared in the market horizon with the mission to offer innovative solutions to satisfy all asset management and financial services needs, and to deliver tangible results for clients through full service access to our capital market & Mutual Fund Management, Diversified Portfolio Management, Private Equity Management and other innovative capital market products.
 
InvesAsia has a proactive team with world class investment experience comprising of professionals with relevant investment experience, strong educational background and local and global experience with institutions that are highly reputed.
 
InvestAsia wants to be the most respected, trusted and prominent Asset Management Company in Bangladesh providing a full range of investment services for local and offshore investors with highest level of satisfaction. With this aim on heart InvestAsia has designed a diversified venture, Professional Private Fund, exclusively for the potential private investors, entrepreneurs and institutions questing of investment in shares & securities for time-range capital gain & thus continual growth of capital asset appreciation.
profile_positions.title: Director & COO

Since the inception of the journey in 2003, Win Trade (Pvt.) Ltd. has gained immense reputation in distribution of SONY VAIO products & services through its nationwide business partners.WinTrade (Pvt.) Ltd. always treats the customers as business partner & tries to satisfy them by providing the World’s best products ensuring the Service, profitability & productivity of their investment.
